about_the_game:
It's time for a pawsome beach adventure!



You play as Hank, a drooling stray cat, who loves the beach. And cheeseburgers (or any other food really). Life would be perfect if he finally found his one true love. After setting paw on Stabby Island to go on an eating frenzy, our little chonky boy disrupts the established order of the beach. Can he stuff his belly without consequences? Will he be alone forever?

Features
  • 2D side-scrolling adventure with a wholesome, but kinda dumb story.
  • 18 accessible levels full with platforming puzzles.
  • Over 1000 food items to inhale. Some are well hidden!
  • Shoot garbage at seagulls, crabs and other enemies.
  • Six mean bosses who are waiting for you to miss that jump.
  • Full controller support.
  • Cats!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Hank Loves The Beach

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
